fullplot: Forty-year-old Andreas arrives in a strange city with no memory of how he got there. He is presented with a job, an apartment - even a wife. But before long, Andreas notices that something is wrong. Andreas makes an attempt to escape the city, but he discovers there's no way out. Andreas meets Hugo, who has found a crack in a wall in his cellar. Beautiful music streams out from the crack. Maybe it leads to "the other side"? A new plan for escape is hatched.
plot: In a strange city where every person seems content beyond reason a new man arrives in town and stirs up trouble by asking too many questions.
title: The Bothersome Man

tomatoes.consensus: Bothersome Man is a surreal, comedic meditation, thoughtfully and skillfully made.
